sn37.31:1.4: Na, bhikkhave, matugamo rupabalahetu va bhogabalahetu va natibalahetu va puttabalahetu va kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn37.31:1.5: Silabalahetu kho, bhikkhave, matugamo kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati.
sn37.31:1.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, panca matugamassa balani”ti.
